alert.note: Alert for Uvalde (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 20 at 5:03PM CDT until April 20 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN UVALDE COUNTY... At 503 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Uvalde Estates, or near Uvalde, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Uvalde, Knippa and Uvalde Estates. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
